author: aliangel
content:
Hey everyone,
I'm a swiss engineer living in France. Studied applied math, mainly statistics and everything data related.
Been interested in eth since 2017, but almost exclusively as a topic I enjoyed learning about, so I've never actually been involved in the development side of the eco-system.

I'm missing a big part of the technical background and knowledge to directly be involved in here, so I plan on lurking mainly, until I understand how stuff works and feel like I can actually contribute in a positive manner.

I'll be glad to exchange with you all ðŸ˜„
Ali
